name: Return of Reckoning
content:
files:
- launcher: https://launcher.returnofreckoning.com/RoRLauncher.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  args: -maploadinfo
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Return of Reckoning/RoRLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts
    description: Installing fonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2017
    description: Installing Visual C++ 2017
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet40
    description: Installing DotNet 4.0
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9
    description: Installing Directx3D 9.0c
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win10
    description: Setting Windows version to Windows 10
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- execute:
    command: mkdir -p "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Return of Reckoning/"
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Return of Reckoning/RoRLauncher.exe
    src: launcher
- task:
    executable: launcher
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
    DXVK_LOG_LEVEL: none
    DXVK_STATE_CACHE: 1
    DXVK_STATE_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    mesa_glthread: 'true'
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
